titleInfo.title: Big Bluegrass Show at Rogers High School

mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and red on white) announcing the Big Bluegrass Show featuring The Rarely Herd with special guests Lonesome Road at Rogers High School on May 4. Poster features metal photoplates of The Rarely Herd and Lonesome Road.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
